question: Match the stages of prophase I given in Column-I with their features in Column-ll and choose the correct options from the choices given below:
Column - I: (a) Leptotene, (b) Zygotene, (c) Pachytene, (d) Diplotene, (e) Diakinesis
Column - II: (i) Exchange of genetic materials..., (ii) Chromosomes visible..., (iii) Dissolution of synaptonemal complex, (iv) Chromosomes start pairing..., (v) Terminalisation of chiasmata
explanation: Leptotene: Visible chromosomes (ii); Zygotene: Pairing (iv); Pachytene: Exchange/Crossing over (i); Diplotene: Dissolution (iii); Diakinesis: Terminalisation (v) [cite: 412-419, 480].
